>>> etc/make.conf
# This doesn't work. $PN is unset.
USE="$PN"

>>> etc/portage/make.profile -> ../../overlay/profiles/default

>>> overlay/profiles/default/make.defaults
# This doesn't work. $PN is unset.
USE="$PN"

>>> overlay/profiles/default/profile.bashrc
die "bashrc must not be considered on metadata extraction"

>>> overlay/profiles/categories
pkg

>>> overlay/pkg/x/x-1.ebuild
EAPI=7
SLOT=0
KEYWORDS="*"
IUSE="$PN"

>>> expect.use
pkg/x -x
